function.name: brightness_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the brightness of a smart home appliance or device.

location.description: The location where the device for which brightness needs to be increased is located.

room.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device on which the brightness needs to be increased.

brightness.description: The amount by which the brightness needs to be set on the device.
